summary: Adds a basement to the player\'s home in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Long time downloader of Skyrim nexus, First time making a mod and uploading it. So please be gently on judging my first mod. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desciption : I downloaded fruitgnome\'s mod and saw that it gets rid of the other mod for a enchanter thing on the table next to achelmy lab. I wanted to keep that cause i was to lazy to just move the soul gems from where they were. So it kinda inspired me to replace that useless box behind the stairs and put a ladder going down into the basement. I just wanted a basement that i can do work in and maybe put up alot of mannequins to showcase armour that is made down there. 

Here is the link to fruitgnome\'s mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9158
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installion:
1) Download the file anywhere
2) Place the plugin file into your \"Data\" folder
3) Once you place file into folder, start up the launcher 
4) Click Data files
5) Check the Breezehome Basement box
6) Click ok and Play =)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstallion:
1) Just delete the file
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
What is Planned for in the Future?
~ Adding Mannequins that fully function
~ Adding more weapon racks, displays, and wall mounts
~ Adding an archery range 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod might intervene with any mod that is placed behind the stairs in place of the box that once was there
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update Logs
V0.2 ~ Fixed some floor flickering bugs and added a tanning rack
V0.1 ~ Intial Release
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bugs 
~Some floors flickering
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is not compatitable with the Dovahkiin Hideout Mod, sorry.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you and Have fun
author: Hardy744
